overview:
NuVeda provides SaaS based Learning Solutions to Scale, Speed and Measure Learning for Corporates, Training Organizations, Content providers, and Universities.

NuVeda provides end-to-end learning solutions that drive accelerated learning for Corporates, Universities and educational institutions. Nuveda focuses on building Continuous Learning Organizations (CLOs), helping them leverage learning for competitive advantage.
